00022 static int default_series_color[] = {
00023     V_BLUE,
00024     V_GREEN,
00025     V_RED,
00026     V_YELLOW,
00027     V_VIOLET,
00028     V_BROWN,
00029     V_ORANGE,
00030     V_PINK,
00031     V_BLACK,
00032     V_WHITE,

00066 //-------- Begin of function GraphSpecialYear::init --------//
00100 void GraphSpecialYear::init(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2,
00101                             int seriesNum, int *dataNum,
00102                             void *dataArray, char dataTypeFlag,
00103                             int thisYearIndicator,
00104                             char *xLabel, char *yLabel,
00105                             char **legendArray, char transparentFlag,
00106                             char orientationFlag, char valueFlag,
00107                             int numFormat, int *seriesColor, int axisColor) {
00108     err_when(seriesNum > DEFAULT_SERIES_COLOR_NUM && !seriesColor);
00109     err_when(seriesNum <= 0);
00110 
00111     graph_width = x2 - x1 - 6;
00112 
00113     err_when(graph_width < 0);
00114 
00115     graph_x1 = x1;
00116     graph_y1 = y1;
00117     graph_x2 = x2;
00118     graph_y2 = y2;
00119     series_num = seriesNum;
00120     data_num = dataNum;
00121     data_array = dataArray;
00122     data_type_flag = dataTypeFlag;
00123 
00124     x_label = xLabel;
00125     y_label = yLabel;
00126     legend_array = legendArray;
00127 
00128     transparent_flag = transparentFlag;
00129     orientation_flag = orientationFlag;
00130     value_flag = valueFlag;
00131     num_format = numFormat;
00132 
00133     series_color = seriesColor ? seriesColor : default_series_color;
00134     axis_color = axisColor;
00135 
00136     init_flag = 1;
00137     this_year_indicator = thisYearIndicator;
00138     y_label_max_len = font_chartsm.text_width(MAX_LEN_LABEL);
00139     set_font(&font_chartsm);
00140 }
00141

00144 //-------- Begin of function GraphSpecialYear::deinit ------------//
00146 void GraphSpecialYear::deinit() {
00147     if (graph_bitmap) {
00148         mem_del(graph_bitmap);
00149         graph_bitmap = NULL;
00150     }
00151 
00152     init_flag = 0;
00153 }

00157 //-------- Begin of function GraphSpecialYear::set_font ------------//
00159 void GraphSpecialYear::set_font(Font *fontPtr) {
00160     if (!init_flag)
00161         return;
00162 
00163     font_ptr = fontPtr;
00164 
00165     calc_pos();
00166 }
00167 
00168 //------------- End of function GraphSpecialYear::set_font ---------//

00170 //-------- Begin of function GraphSpecialYear::calc_pos ------------//
00175 void GraphSpecialYear::calc_pos() {
00176     if (legend_array) {
00177         short textWidth = 0, textHeight = font_ptr->max_font_height;
00178 
00179         for (int i = 0; i < series_num; i++) {
00180             if (font_ptr->text_width(legend_array[i]) > textWidth)
00181                 textWidth = font_ptr->text_width(legend_array[i]);
00182         }
00183 
00184         err_when(textWidth + LEGEND_X_SPACING * 2 > graph_width);
00185 
00186         legend_x_num = (graph_width - LEGEND_X_SPACING*2) / (textWidth + LEGEND_X_SPACING*2);
00187         legend_y_num = (series_num / legend_x_num) + ((series_num % legend_x_num) ? 1 : 0);
00188 
00189         graph_height = graph_y2 - graph_y1 - legend_y_num * (textHeight + LEGEND_Y_SPACING) - 6;
00190 
00191         err_when(graph_height <= 0);
00192 
00193         legend_width = (graph_width - LEGEND_X_SPACING*2) / legend_x_num;
00194         legend_height = textHeight + LEGEND_Y_SPACING;
00195     }
00196     else {
00197         legend_width = legend_height = legend_x_num = legend_y_num = 0;
00198         graph_height = graph_y2 - graph_y1 - 6;
00199     }
00200 
00201     short YLabelWidth = y_label ? (orientation_flag ? font_ptr->max_font_height : font_ptr->text_width(y_label)) : -COMMON_OFFSET;
00202     short XLabelHeight = x_label ? (font_ptr->max_font_height) : -COMMON_OFFSET;
00203     series_x1 = graph_x1 + 4 + COMMON_OFFSET*4 + YLabelWidth + y_label_max_len;
00204     series_y1 = graph_y1 + 4 + COMMON_OFFSET*6;
00205     series_x2 = graph_x2 - 4 - COMMON_OFFSET*16;
00206     series_y2 = graph_y1 + graph_height - COMMON_OFFSET*3 - (font_ptr->max_font_height);
00207 }
00208 
00209 //------------ End of function GraphSpecialYear::calc_pos ---------//

00211 //-------- Begin of function GraphSpecialYear::paint --------------//
00213 void GraphSpecialYear::paint() {
00214     if (transparent_flag) {
00215         user_interface.brighten(graph_x1+4, graph_y1+4, graph_x2-2, graph_y2-2);
00216         if (legend_array)
00217             draw_legend();
00218         draw_axis_label();
00219         graph_bitmap = vga_back.save_area(graph_x1+4, graph_y1+4, graph_x2-2, graph_y2-2, graph_bitmap);
00220     }
00221 
00222     //  paint_flag = 1;
00223     refresh();
00224 }
00225 
00226 //------------- End of function GraphSpecialYear::paint -----------//
00227 
00228 //-------- Begin of function GraphSpecialYear::refresh ------------//
00230 void GraphSpecialYear::refresh() {
00231     if (transparent_flag) {
00232         user_interface.rect(graph_x1, graph_y1, graph_x2, graph_y2, 1);
00233         vga_back.rest_area(graph_bitmap, 0, 0);
00234     }
00235     else {
00236         user_interface.bar(graph_x1, graph_y1, graph_x2, graph_y2);
00237         user_interface.panel(graph_x1+3, graph_y1+3, graph_x2-4, graph_y2-4);
00238     }
00239     if (legend_array)
00240         draw_legend();
00241 
00242     draw_scale();
00243     draw_series();
00244     draw_scale();
00245     //  if (!paint_flag)
00246     //          vga.blt_buf(graph_x1, graph_y1, graph_x2+2, graph_y2+2);
00247     //  else
00248     //          paint_flag = 0;
00249 }

00253 //---------- Begin of function GraphSpecialYear::draw_legend ------------//
00255 void GraphSpecialYear::draw_legend() {
00256     for (int i = 0; i < series_num; i++) {
00257         short legendX = graph_x1 + 4 + (i % legend_x_num) * legend_width + LEGEND_X_SPACING;
00258         short legendY = graph_y1 + 4 + graph_height + (i / legend_x_num) * legend_height;
00259         user_interface.bar( legendX+LEGEND_X_SPACING, legendY+LEGEND_Y_SPACING,
00260                             legendX+LEGEND_X_SPACING+LEGEND_SIZE, legendY+LEGEND_Y_SPACING+LEGEND_SIZE,
00261                             series_color[i] );
00262         font_ptr->put( legendX+LEGEND_X_SPACING*2+LEGEND_SIZE, legendY+LEGEND_Y_SPACING, legend_array[i] );
00263     }
00264 }
00265 
00266 //------------ End of function GraphSpecialYear::draw_legend ------------//

00268 //---------- Begin of function GraphSpecialYear::draw_axis_label --------//
00270 void GraphSpecialYear::draw_axis_label() {
00271     short textHeight = font_ptr->max_font_height;
00272 
00273     if (x_label) {
00274         font_ptr->center_put( series_x1, series_y2+COMMON_OFFSET*2+textHeight,
00275                               series_x2, graph_y1+graph_height-COMMON_OFFSET, x_label );
00276     }
00277 
00278     if (y_label) {
00279         short textWidth = font_ptr->text_width(y_label) + 1;
00280 
00281         if (orientation_flag) {
00282             short *fontBuf = (short *) sys.common_data_buf;
00283             err_when(textWidth * textHeight * sizeof(short) > COMMON_DATA_BUF_SIZE);
00284 
00285             for (int i = 0; i < textWidth * textHeight; i++)
00286                 *fontBuf++ = transparent_code_w;
00287 
00288             font_ptr->put_to_bufferW(fontBuf = (short *) sys.common_data_buf, textWidth * sizeof(short), 0, 0, y_label);
00289 
00290             short xStart = graph_x1 + 4 + COMMON_OFFSET * 2;
00291             short yStart = (series_y1 + series_y2 - textWidth) / 2;
00292 
00293             for (short x = 0; x < textHeight; x++) {
00294                 for (short y = textWidth - 1; y >= 0; y--, fontBuf++) {
00295                     if (*fontBuf != transparent_code_w)
00296                         *vga_back.buf_ptr(xStart+x, yStart+y) = *fontBuf;
00297                 }
00298             }
00299         }
00300         else {
00301             font_ptr->center_put( graph_x1+4+COMMON_OFFSET*2, series_y1,
00302                                   graph_x1+4+COMMON_OFFSET*2+textWidth, series_y2, y_label);
00303         }
00304     }
00305 }

00309 //---------- Begin of function GraphSpecialYear::find_scale -------------//
00311 void GraphSpecialYear::find_scale() {
00312     double data, maxVal = 0.0,minVal = 0.0;
00313 
00314     for (int i = 0; i < (series_num+2) * *data_num; i++) {
00315         switch (data_type_flag) {
00316         case DATA_DOUBLE:
00317             data = ((double*)data_array)[i];
00318             break;
00319         case DATA_FLOAT:
00320             data = double(((float*)data_array)[i]);
00321             break;
00322         case DATA_INT:
00323             data = double(((int*)data_array)[i]);
00324             break;
00325         case DATA_LONG:
00326             data = double(((long*)data_array)[i]);
00327             break;
00328         }
00329         if (data > maxVal)
00330             maxVal = data;
00331         if (data < minVal)
00332             minVal = data;
00333     }
00334     if (maxVal>0)
00335         max_scale = maxVal;
00336     else
00337         max_scale = 10;
00338 
00339     if (minVal<0)
00340         min_scale = minVal;
00341     else
00342         min_scale = 0;
00343 
00344 }
00345 
00346 //------------ End of function GraphSpecialYear::find_scale -------------//
00347 
00348 //---------- Begin of function GraphSpecialYear::draw_scale -------------//
00350 void GraphSpecialYear::draw_scale() {
00351     find_scale();
00352 
00353     //------ Draw y-axis -------//
00354     vga_back.bar(series_x1, series_y1-COMMON_OFFSET*2, series_x1+1, series_y2, axis_color);
00355 
00356     xAxisPos=(short)(series_y1+(series_y2-series_y1)*(max_scale)/(max_scale-min_scale));
00357 
00358     posScaleNum = (xAxisPos-series_y1-font_ptr->max_font_height) / (font_ptr->max_font_height*3/2);
00359     if ( posScaleNum > 0 )
00360         posScaleNum = short(pow(2,floor(log10(double(posScaleNum))/log10(2.0))));
00361     else
00362         posScaleNum = 0;
00363     negScaleNum = (series_y2-xAxisPos-font_ptr->max_font_height) / (font_ptr->max_font_height*3/2);
00364     if ( negScaleNum > 0 )
00365         negScaleNum = short(pow(2,ceil(log10(double(negScaleNum))/log10(2.0))));
00366     else
00367         negScaleNum = 0;
00368 
00369 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
00370     if ( posScaleNum + negScaleNum <= 0) {
00371         posScaleNum = 1;
00372         negScaleNum = 0;
00373     }
00374 #endif
00375 
00376     short posScaleStep;
00377     short negScaleStep;
00378 
00379     if(posScaleNum<1) {
00380         posScaleStep = 0;
00381         posScaleInc = 0;
00382     }
00383     else {
00384         posScaleStep  = (xAxisPos-series_y1) / posScaleNum;
00385         posScaleInc   = max_scale / posScaleNum;
00386 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
00387         if( data_type_flag==DATA_INT || data_type_flag==DATA_LONG )
00388             posScaleInc = ceil(posScaleInc);            // don't like integer type to have non-integral posScaleInc
00389 #endif
00390     }
00391 
00392     if(negScaleNum<1) {
00393         negScaleStep = 0;
00394         negScaleInc = 0;
00395     }
00396     else {
00397         negScaleStep = (series_y2-xAxisPos) / negScaleNum;
00398         negScaleInc   = -min_scale / negScaleNum;
00399 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
00400         if( data_type_flag==DATA_INT || data_type_flag==DATA_LONG )
00401             negScaleInc = ceil(negScaleInc);            // don't like integer type to have non-integral negScaleInc
00402 #endif
00403     }
00404 
00405     if(posScaleNum+negScaleNum<1) {
00406         scaleStep = 0;
00407         scaleInc   = 0;
00408     }
00409     else {
00410         scaleStep = (short)((series_y2-series_y1)/(posScaleNum+negScaleNum));
00411         scaleInc = ((max_scale-min_scale)/(posScaleNum+negScaleNum));
00412 #if(GAME_VERSION>=200)
00413         if( data_type_flag==DATA_INT || data_type_flag==DATA_LONG )
00414             scaleInc = max(posScaleInc, negScaleInc);
00415 #endif
00416     }
00417 
00418     double scaleValue;
00419 
00420     for (int i = -negScaleNum,ycheck=xAxisPos-i*scaleStep;
00421          ycheck>graph_y1;
00422          i++,ycheck-=scaleStep) {
00423 
00424         vga_back.bar(series_x1, ycheck, series_x1+COMMON_OFFSET*2, ycheck, axis_color);
00425 
00426         scaleValue = i*scaleInc;
00427 
00428         switch (data_type_flag) {
00429         case DATA_FLOAT:
00430         case DATA_DOUBLE:
00431             font_ptr->right_put(series_x1-COMMON_OFFSET, ycheck-font_ptr->max_font_height/2, m.format(scaleValue,num_format));
00432             break;
00433         case DATA_INT:
00434         case DATA_LONG:
00435             font_ptr->right_put(series_x1-COMMON_OFFSET, ycheck-font_ptr->max_font_height/2, m.format(long(scaleValue),num_format));
00436         }
00437     }
00438 
00439     //------ Draw x-axis -------//
00440     vga_back.bar(series_x1, xAxisPos-COMMON_OFFSET, series_x2+1, xAxisPos, axis_color);
00441 
00442     // show x-axis scale
00443 
00444     // At max, how much data points shown for each series
00445     int data_year_shown=8;
00446 
00447     // The scales within how much years should be shown
00448     int scale_year_shown=8;
00449 
00450     // pesudo year = which year the indicator pointing to
00451     double pesudo_end;
00452     // ##### patch begin Gilbert 07/09/2001 ######//
00453     pesudo_end = info.financial_year();
00454     //if(info.game_month<finance.fiscal_year_start_month)
00455     //  pesudo_end=info.game_year-1;
00456     //else
00457     //  pesudo_end=info.game_year;
00458     // ##### patch end Gilbert 07/09/2001 ######//
00459 
00460     if(info.graph_year<data_year_shown)
00461         data_year_shown=info.graph_year;
00462 
00463     short maxLabelWidth = font_ptr->text_width(m.format(pesudo_end, 16));
00464     double scaleYearRatio =1.0;
00465     x_axis_step = (series_x2-series_x1) / (scale_year_shown);
00466 
00467     short displayInc = 1;
00468     while (displayInc * x_axis_step < maxLabelWidth ) displayInc++;
00469 
00470     double printing_offset=1-finance.fiscal_year_start_month/12.0;
00471 
00472     int start_printing_year=(int)(pesudo_end+
00473                                   ((this_year_indicator>=0)?this_year_indicator:0)
00474                                   +1-data_year_shown);
00475 
00476     //  double actual_end_year=(double)info.game_month/12.0+info.game_year+1;
00477     //  int show_end_year=(int)(actual_end_year-finance.fiscal_year_start_month/12.0);
00478     //  int show_start_year=show_end_year-year_shown+1;
00479 
00480     //------ Draw x-axis -------//
00481     for (i = 0; i < scale_year_shown ; i += displayInc) {
00482         vga_back.bar(
00483             (int)(series_x1+(printing_offset+i)*x_axis_step),
00484             xAxisPos-COMMON_OFFSET*2,
00485             (int)(series_x1+(printing_offset+i)*x_axis_step),
00486             xAxisPos, axis_color);
00487         font_ptr->center_put(
00488             (int)(series_x1+(printing_offset+i)*x_axis_step)-maxLabelWidth/2-COMMON_OFFSET,
00489             xAxisPos+COMMON_OFFSET,
00490             (int)(series_x1+(printing_offset+i)*x_axis_step)+maxLabelWidth/2+COMMON_OFFSET,
00491             xAxisPos+COMMON_OFFSET+font_ptr->max_font_height,
00492             m.format((int)(start_printing_year+i/scaleYearRatio), 16));
00493     }
00494 
00495     //---- Draw this year indicators ----//
00496     if((this_year_indicator>=0)&&(this_year_indicator<HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT))
00497         for(int j=series_y1;j<series_y2+COMMON_OFFSET;j+=8)
00498             vga_back.bar(
00499                 (int)(series_x1+(data_year_shown-this_year_indicator-1)*x_axis_step),
00500                 j,
00501                 (int)(series_x1+(data_year_shown-this_year_indicator-1)*x_axis_step),
00502                 j+4,
00503                 axis_color);
00504 }

00508 //---------- Begin of function GraphSpecialYear::draw_series ------------//
00510 void GraphSpecialYear::draw_series() {
00511     switch (data_type_flag) {
00512     case DATA_FLOAT: draw_series_float(); break;
00513     case DATA_DOUBLE: draw_series_double(); break;
00514     case DATA_INT: draw_series_int(); break;
00515     case DATA_LONG: draw_series_long(); break;
00516     }
00517 }
00518 
00519 //------------ End of function GraphSpecialYear::draw_series ------------//

00521 //---------- Begin of function GraphSpecialYear::draw_series_float ------------//
00523 void GraphSpecialYear::draw_series_float() {
00524     float *dataArray = (float *) data_array;
00525     short prevX, prevY, currX, currY;
00526     //  short currX1[HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT],currX2[HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT],
00527     //                  currY1[HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT],currY2[HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT];
00528 
00529     // filling
00530 
00531     for (int i = 0; i < series_num; i++) {
00532         dataArray-=info.graph_year;
00533         dataArray+=HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT;
00534         prevX = series_x1;
00535         prevY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * scaleStep/scaleInc) ;
00536 
00537         dataArray++;
00538         vga_back.thick_line(prevX-1, prevY, prevX+1, prevY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]));
00539 
00540         for (int j = 1; j < info.graph_year; j++) {
00541             currX = series_x1 + j * x_axis_step;
00542             currY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * scaleStep/scaleInc) ;
00543 
00544             vga_back.thick_line(prevX, prevY, currX, currY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]));
00545 
00546             prevX = currX;
00547             prevY = currY;
00548             dataArray++;
00549         }
00550 
00551         if (value_flag)
00552             draw_value(dataArray-1, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]), prevX+COMMON_OFFSET-(int)(0.3f*x_axis_step), prevY-font_news.max_font_height/2, DATA_FLOAT);
00553     }
00554 
00555     for (i = series_num; i < 2+series_num; i++) {
00556         dataArray-=info.graph_year;
00557         dataArray+=HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT;
00558         prevX = series_x1;
00559         prevY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * scaleStep/scaleInc) ;
00560 
00561         dataArray++;
00562 
00563         for (int j = 1; j < info.graph_year; j++) {
00564             currX = series_x1 + j * x_axis_step;
00565             currY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * scaleStep/scaleInc) ;
00566 
00567             vga_back.line(prevX, prevY, currX, currY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i+4]));
00568 
00569             prevX = currX;
00570             prevY = currY;
00571             dataArray++;
00572         }
00573 
00574         if (value_flag)
00575             draw_value(dataArray-1, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]), prevX+COMMON_OFFSET-(int)(0.3f*x_axis_step), prevY-font_news.max_font_height/2, DATA_FLOAT);
00576     }
00577 
00578 }
00579 
00580 //------------ End of function GraphSpecialYear::draw_series_float ------------//

00582 //---------- Begin of function GraphSpecialYear::draw_series_double ------------//
00584 void GraphSpecialYear::draw_series_double() {
00585     double *dataArray = (double *) data_array;
00586     short prevX, prevY, currX, currY;
00587 
00588     for (int i = 0; i < series_num; i++) {
00589         dataArray-=info.graph_year;
00590         dataArray+=HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT;
00591         prevX = series_x1;
00592         prevY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * (double)scaleStep/scaleInc);
00593 
00594         dataArray++;
00595         vga_back.thick_line(prevX-1, prevY, prevX+1, prevY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]));
00596 
00597         for (int j = 1; j < info.graph_year; j++) {
00598             currX = series_x1 + j * x_axis_step;
00599             currY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * (double)scaleStep/scaleInc);
00600 
00601             vga_back.thick_line(prevX, prevY, currX, currY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]));
00602 
00603             prevX = currX;
00604             prevY = currY;
00605             dataArray++;
00606         }
00607 
00608         if (value_flag)
00609             draw_value(dataArray-1, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]), prevX+COMMON_OFFSET-(int)(0.3f*x_axis_step), prevY-font_news.max_font_height/2, DATA_DOUBLE);
00610     }
00611 }
00612 
00613 //------------ End of function GraphSpecialYear::draw_series_double ------------//
00614 
00615 //---------- Begin of function GraphSpecialYear::draw_series_int ------------//
00617 void GraphSpecialYear::draw_series_int() {
00618     int *dataArray = (int *) data_array;
00619     short prevX, prevY, currX, currY;
00620     short prevY1, currY1;
00621     short prevY2, currY2;
00622     short fillY1,fillY2,fillY;
00623     double m,m1,m2;
00624 
00625     dataArray-=(info.graph_year);
00626     dataArray+=HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT;
00627     prevX = series_x1;
00628     prevY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * scaleStep/scaleInc);
00629     prevY1 = xAxisPos-(short)(*(dataArray+HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT) * scaleStep/scaleInc);
00630     prevY2 = xAxisPos-(short)(*(dataArray+2*HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT) * scaleStep/scaleInc);
00631     dataArray++;
00632 
00633     for (int j = 1; j < (info.graph_year); j++) {
00634         currX = series_x1 + j * x_axis_step;
00635         currY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * scaleStep/scaleInc);
00636         currY1 = xAxisPos-(short)(*(dataArray+series_num*HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT) * scaleStep/scaleInc);
00637         currY2 = xAxisPos-(short)(*(dataArray+(series_num+1)*HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT) * scaleStep/scaleInc);
00638 
00639         // filling region
00640         m=((double)currY-prevY)/x_axis_step;
00641         m1=((double)currY1-prevY1)/x_axis_step;
00642         m2=((double)currY2-prevY2)/x_axis_step;
00643 
00644         for(int k=0;k<x_axis_step;k++) {
00645             fillY=(int)(m*k+prevY);
00646             fillY1=(int)(m1*k+prevY1);
00647             fillY2=(int)(m2*k+prevY2);
00648             if(fillY>fillY1)
00649                 vga_back.line(prevX+k, fillY1, prevX+k, fillY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[4]));
00650             else
00651                 vga_back.line(prevX+k, fillY, prevX+k, fillY1, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[5]));
00652 
00653             if(fillY>fillY2)
00654                 vga_back.line(prevX+k, fillY2, prevX+k, fillY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[4]));
00655             else
00656                 vga_back.line(prevX+k, fillY, prevX+k, fillY2, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[5]));
00657         }
00658 
00659         vga_back.thick_line(prevX, prevY, currX, currY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[0]));
00660 
00661         prevX = currX;
00662         prevY = currY;
00663         prevY1 = currY1;
00664         prevY2 = currY2;
00665         dataArray++;
00666     }
00667 
00668     if (value_flag)
00669         draw_value(dataArray-1, vga_back.translate_color(V_BLACK), prevX+COMMON_OFFSET-(int)(0.3f*x_axis_step), prevY-font_news.max_font_height/2, DATA_INT);
00670 
00671     for (int i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
00672         dataArray-=(info.graph_year);
00673         dataArray+=HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT;
00674         prevX = series_x1;
00675         prevY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * scaleStep/scaleInc);
00676 
00677         dataArray++;
00678 
00679         for (int j = 1; j < (info.graph_year); j++) {
00680             currX = series_x1 + j * x_axis_step;
00681             currY = (short)(xAxisPos-(int)(*dataArray * scaleStep/scaleInc));
00682 
00683             vga_back.line(prevX, prevY, currX, currY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i+1]));
00684 
00685             prevX = currX;
00686             prevY = currY;
00687             dataArray++;
00688         }
00689 
00690         if (value_flag)
00691             draw_value(dataArray-1, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]), prevX+COMMON_OFFSET-(int)(0.3f*x_axis_step), prevY-font_news.max_font_height/2, DATA_INT);
00692     }
00693 
00694 }
00695 
00696 //------------ End of function GraphSpecialYear::draw_series_int ------------//

00698 //---------- Begin of function GraphSpecialYear::draw_series_long ------------//
00700 void GraphSpecialYear::draw_series_long() {
00701     long *dataArray = (long *) data_array;
00702     short prevX, prevY, currX, currY;
00703 
00704     for (int i = 0; i < series_num; i++) {
00705         dataArray-=info.graph_year;
00706         dataArray+=HISTORY_YEAR_COUNT;
00707         prevX = series_x1;
00708         prevY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * scaleStep/scaleInc);
00709 
00710         dataArray++;
00711         vga_back.thick_line(prevX-1, prevY, prevX+1, prevY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]));
00712 
00713         for (int j = 1; j < info.graph_year; j++) {
00714             currX = series_x1 + j * x_axis_step;
00715             currY = xAxisPos-(short)(*dataArray * scaleStep/scaleInc);
00716 
00717             vga_back.thick_line(prevX, prevY, currX, currY, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]));
00718 
00719             prevX = currX;
00720             prevY = currY;
00721             dataArray++;
00722         }
00723 
00724         if (value_flag)
00725             draw_value(dataArray-1, vga_back.translate_color(series_color[i]), prevX+COMMON_OFFSET-(int)(0.3f*x_axis_step), prevY-font_news.max_font_height/2, DATA_LONG);
00726     }
00727 }

00731 //---------- Begin of function GraphSpecialYear::draw_value -------------------//
00733 void GraphSpecialYear::draw_value(void *value, int color, short x, short y, int dataType) {
00734     char *valueString;
00735     switch (data_type_flag) {
00736     case DATA_FLOAT:
00737         valueString = m.format(*((float *) value), num_format); break;
00738     case DATA_DOUBLE:
00739         valueString = m.format(*((double *) value), num_format); break;
00740     case DATA_INT:
00741         valueString = m.format(*((int *) value), num_format); break;
00742     case DATA_LONG:
00743         valueString = m.format(*((long *) value), num_format); break;
00744     }
00745 
00746     short textHeight = font_news.max_font_height;
00747     short textWidth = font_news.text_width(valueString) + 1;
00748     /*  
00749         short *bitmap = (short *) sys.common_data_buf;
00750         err_when( (2 + textWidth * textHeight) * sizeof(short) > COMMON_DATA_BUF_SIZE );
00751         *bitmap++ = textWidth;
00752         *bitmap++ = textHeight;
00753 
00754         short *shortPtr = bitmap;
00755         for (int i = 0; i < textWidth * textHeight; i++)
00756         *shortPtr++ = transparent_code_w;
00757 
00758         font_news.put_to_bufferW(bitmap, textWidth * sizeof(short), 0, 0, valueString);
00759 
00760         shortPtr = bitmap;
00761         for (i = 0; i < textWidth * textHeight; i++, shortPtr++)
00762         if (*shortPtr != transparent_code_w)
00763         *shortPtr = color;
00764 
00765         vga_back.put_bitmapW_trans(x, y, (short *) sys.common_data_buf);
00766     */
00767     font_chartsm.put(x+3,y,valueString);
00768 }
